name: C2C Immigration & Legal Services
overview:
C2C Immigration & Legal Services Inc.: owned and managed by Member of Canadian Society of Immigration Consultants (CSIC), Fellow of Canadian Migration Institute (CMI), Member of The Law Society of Upper Canada (LSUC).

Coming to us is the first step of your success. C2C will help you to come to your country of dream.

S speedy, Safe, Save A Assorted, Accessible, Accredited V Valued, Verified E Efficient, Effective

Study & Immigration Services

  • Student visa & study permit
  • PG work permit & LMO work permit
  • Business immigrant
  • Canadian Experience Class
  • Skilled workers & professionals
  • Sponsoring family
  • Quebec immigration
  • Provincial nominee program
  • Live-in caregiver
  • Work permit
  • Visitor visa
  • Visa extension
  • Residency requirement
  • PR card & citizenship application
  • US visitor visa
  • China visitor visa

Financial Services:

  • Travel insurance
  • Emergency medical insurance for international students
  • Life Insurance
  • Critical illness insurance
  • Disability insurance
  • Long-term care
  • Health & dental plan

Legal Services:

  • Accident Benefits
  • WSIB
  • Small claims court
  • Landlord-Tenant dispute
  • Individual name change
  • Mediator service
  • Document translation & certification

Our mission is to help you from the start of immigration to the final settlement in your new country.

Address: 95 Mural Street, Suite 600, Richmond Hill, ON L4B 3G2 Tel: 905-747-3312 416-562-8258 Fax: 905-882-3132 Email: info@c2clegal.com Web: www.c2clegal.com
